hero.head: Create your own QR Codes and boost your business or idea
hero.descriptionHero:
Many companies use the QR code in their marketing and advertising campaigns, allowing various types of data to be added, such as: B. Website links, social media, account information, phone numbers, even coupons, opening hours, or a PDF file (with a list of product prices or the services you want to offer your customers).
Here at QR Code Germany we have made sure that everything is easy and simple to use for the customer as you will find many simple and useful options that will help you a lot in providing useful and important information to your customers in the easiest and cheapest way to deliver way.
hero.differentQr: QR CODE GERMANY makes all the difference
hero.qrGermanyDefinition: QR Code is the future of marketing on which successful projects are based. Where you can market your products and increase the number of customers by making it easier for customers to obtain the information you want to deliver to them in a very easy way.
hero.QRTypes: Create different types of QR codes
hero.QRcodes: QR codes can hold a large amount of content and at QR Code Germany, we offer them all.
hero.Url: You can now easily place this type of QR code on your car and display all the specifications that distinguish it with the required price to be sold easily
hero.socialMedia:
You can place this type on the cover of food packages, through which it displays (the list of product ingredients, warning signs, nutritional value table, product mages and other important information for the consumer).
You can easily replace or update the information at any time without re-printing a new QR code
hero.VsCard: Display essential business information on a dedicated, mobile-friendly page so that you can add a lot of important information, and you can easily replace any information on the page at any time without reprinting the QR code again .
hero.Text: Whatever type of product you are marketing, you can, through this type of QR code, display images and all information of interest to the consumer on a dedicated and mobile-friendly page in an innovative way, and you can easily replace or update the information at any time without re-printing a new QR code .

difference.easyStatiscs: Easy way to pass your business details
difference.dynamicTitle: A quick way to download the app
difference.nfc: An easy and fast way for customers to reach your social media, which leads to an increase in followers and fans on your pages
difference.advantage: Use the QR code to submit deals and offers instantly

ready.letGet: Let's get you started with the tool suite.

learnMore.Beginner’sParagraph:
A QR code - an abbreviation of Quick Response Code - is a two-dimensional code in which several thousand characters can be encoded.
This can include information about the product to which the code is attached, or about the company, contact details or a target URL.
When scanning the QR code with a smartphone or tablet, the user calls up this information or is directed to the target website, for example.
The target website can also be a YouTube video or PDF File And many important and useful things that we invite you to explore with us
learnMore.ScanQrParagraph:
• • Include the QR code at the end of the email signature.
• • Include QR codes in your physical and online advertising materials.
• • Take advantage of vCard business cards to pass on business details.
• • Paste QR codes on all the products you sell.
• • Include QR codes on signs, tables, and any type of outdoor area that can catch customers' attention
learnMore.anatomyQr: There are two categories of QR Codes
learnMore.anatomyQrParagraph: Here in QR Code Germany we have limited everything to be easy to use and simple for the customer, where you will find a lot of easy and useful options that will help you a lot in delivering useful and important information to your customers in the easiest and cheapest way.
learnMore.PositioningParagraph:
A Static QR Code contains information that is fixed and uneditable once the Code has been generated , and because of their fixed nature, they are not ideal for businesses or marketing campaigns as Static Codes do not track metrics or allow for editing post creation.
This means fixed QR codes cannot be modified, tracked or updated, so it is more convenient for one-time use.
This means when you choose a Static QR code, you cannot change or modify anything once this code is generated, otherwise you will have to change the entire code in order to modify the content of the code.
learnMore.TimingQrParagraph:
you always have the option to edit the content connected to this particular QR Code. Whatever content this may be (images, audios, videos, events, social media links, etc.), is shown on a mobile-optimized and customizable landing .pageSo that this type allows you to update, modify or change the content as many times as you need to, making it the most suitable for business and marketing purposes.
The dynamic QR code lets you know the geographic location and time of each scan, as well as the number of scans performed on the code. This allows you to address your target group directly and restart your advertising campaigns the greatest benefit .
If you’ve chosen a Dynamic QR Code, then you always have the option to edit the content connected to this particular QR Code.
Whatever content this may be (images, audios, videos, events, social media links, etc.), So that you can avoid and correct typos, which usually occur after printing And it's all rendered on a mobile-optimized and customizable landing page.
learnMore.QuietZoneParagraph:
QR Code is incredibly useful for businesses.
So that it can be added to printing materials such as business cards, brochures, vehicles, or even office windows and store doors So that you can through it:
learnMore.Quiet:
1. Directing customers to a landing page or website
2. Easy way to pass your business details
3. A quick way to download the app
4. An easy and fast way for customers to reach your social media, which leads to an increase in followers and fans on your pages
5. Use the QR code to submit deals and offers instantly
6. Easy way to find the address

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Pay once and enjoy all the benefits of a static and dynamic QR code without a monthly subscription (the price does not include VAT)
pricing.message: if you want to create more than 10
pricing.desPricing: When creating the QR code, a period of 15 days is provided during which the code and the information it contains may be modified free of charge, after which an amount of 10 euros will be paid regardless of the number of modifications made by the customer, whether or not one or more changes are involved. The price does not include VAT and is paid once without a monthly subscription
